content:
Cole lives at $1^{\text{st}}$ Avenue and $11^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by the point $(1,11)$ on the map below.  He decides to meet his best friend at the movie theater at $6^{\text{th}}$ Avenue and $4^{\text{th}}$ Street, represented by $(6, 4)$ on the map.  He will walk down $1^{\text{st}}$ Avenue then over on $4^{\text{th}}$ Street.

**Plot Cole's house and the movie theater on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How many blocks does Cole walk to get to the theater?**  
[[☃ input-number 1]] blocks
